## v0.3.1

- Improve visibility of invisibles/whitespaces.

### RStudio

- Deprecated, use <https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/>.

## v0.3.0

- Repo changed to monorepo.
- All themes have been enhanced to achieve greater consistency.

## v0.2.1

- Also available in <https://open-vsx.org/>
  [[Link]](https://open-vsx.org/extension/dieghernan/oksolar-theme).

## v0.2.0

- Change accent definition to match themes.

- Add more variants:
  - `OKSolar Red`
  - `OKSolar Green`
  - `OKSolar Purple`
  - `OKSolar Purple`
  - `OKSolar Blue`
  - `OKSolar Sky`

- New icons and banner.

## v0.1.0

- Initial release
